CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 12, 1952, pg. 20, reads: "Gus" Greenlee and his son - The late William A. (Gus) Greenlee had many friends and acquaintainces when he operated his Crawfrod Grill No. 1 at the corner of Wylie Avenue and Townsend Street. He talked, joked, wined and dined with them often but none was more welcome than his son, William A. (Bill) Green Jr., shown above with him. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: William A. "Gus" Greenlee, and his son William A. "Bill" Greenlee Jr., standing at bar in Crawford Grill No. 1
